tool.name: FpocketSelect
tool.description: : Selects a single pocket in the outputs of the fpocket building block.

param.name: input_pockets_zip
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path to the pockets found by fpocket. Format: [input].zip

param.name: outname_output_pocket_pdb
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the PDB file with the cavity found by fpocket Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_pocket_pqr
param.label: output PQR name
param.help: Path to the PQR file with the pocket found by fpocket Format: [output].pqr

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: pocket
param.label: pocket
param.help: Pocket id from the summary json given by the fpocket building block.
